definitions.definition: a family consisting of parents and their children and grandparents of a marital partner

examples: Some want to live with extended families, others with nuclear families, some on their own.
In contrast, the social units of long-tailed tits are not nuclear families, and they do not defend territories.

definitions.definition: a family consisting of the nuclear family and their blood relatives

examples: In extended families, the network of relatives acts as a close-knit community.
